actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to permit the Internal Revenue Service to accept a check of the Philippine Commercial and Industrial Bank, Manila, Philippines, for account of the estate of Linnie Jane Hodges.

summary.text: Permits the Internal Revenue Service to accept a check of the Philippine Commercial and Industrial Bank, Manila, Philippines, for account of the estate of Linnie Jane Hodges.

titles.title: A bill to permit the Internal Revenue Service to accept a check of the Philippine Commercial and Industrial Bank, Manila, Philippines, for account of the estate of Linnie Jane Hodges.
